Interstitials
=============
Methods for selecting an interfacial region from a bicrystal
and enumerating likely interstitial sites. The Voronoi analysis
and package has been adapated to work with the ase interface from the
`pylada-defect package <https://github.com/pylada/pylada-defects>`_.
Please see and cite the `publication <https://doi.org/10.1016/j.commatsci.2016.12.040>`_ 
describing this package.

.. automodule:: imeall.calc_eseg
  :members:

.. automodule:: imeall.calc_inter_ener
  :members:
